title: Zakir Naik
summary: Zakir Abdul Karim Naik (born 18 October 1965) is an Indian Islamic televangelist and preacher. Naik is renowned as a non-Arabic scholar, public orator, and a scholar on comparative religion.[12] He is the founder and president of the Islamic Research Foundation (IRF) and the Peace TV Network, the largest religious satellite channel network in the world.[13][14]
